esema jathika lotharayi mandalaye prathirupayata haniwana siduwim wenuwen widhimath parikshana kadinamin pawathwa adala nigamanawalata pamina nomathi bawada mudranakaruwan wisin upa konthrath labadima ha sidukaranu labana giwisum kadakirima sambandhayen apramadawa nithimaya katayuthu sidukara nomathi bawa saha mema wishesha wiganana warthawa wiganakadhipathi sathu balathala, sampath ha kalaya yana wishaya sima thula sidukarana lada heyin ehi wishayapathayen obbata gos wiganakadhipathita nigamanaya kala nohaki mattame nithiwirodhi ho saparadhi katayuthu siduwi athda yanna wiganakadhipathige parikshawata lak nokerunu bawin ewani parikshawak kala yuthu yayi hangi yannenam ee sandaha wisheshitha wu aayathanayanhi sahaya laba ganima sudusu bawa da wiganakadhipathiwaraya wisin thawaduratath nigamanaya kara ee bawa parlimenthu podu wyapara karaka sabhawata siya warthawa magin dakwa atha.
